page.title: 16RHU PRIMARY SCHOOL SPORTS.
page.content:
18th.June,1985. Order of Events.
Flat Race:_Beginning with the younger children, each class has the opportunity of taking part in heats of girls and boys. Classes 1_3:_ Hoop Race. Each team member must jump up to a hoop with a bean bag between his ankles,step through the hoop and run back to his team. Classes 4_7:_Three_legged Race. Two children stand side by side and tie inside legs together then run to the finishing line. Novelty Races. Classes 1_3:_Potato and Spoon Race where children have to run balancing a potato on a spoon. Classes 4_6:_Dressing up Team Race. Class 7 Girls:_Skipping Race. Class 7 Boys:_Football Dribble.
